channel.title: b1g on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in b1g on Ross A. Baker

item.description: To help some of the newcomers make connections: name 5-7 things that interest you but aren't in your profile, as tags so they are searchable. Then boost this post or repeat its instructions so others know to do the same. #bayesian #curling #italianbeef #zappa #b1g #coaching Don't forget to boost good posts with hashtags so that searchable posts make it out to more instances!
